title: Dal Makhni
ingredients: Spices - garam masala, chili powder, salt

title: Idli Sambar
instructions: Grind soaked rice and dal, ferment overnight, steam idlis. Cook sambar with tamarind and vegetables.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: Spices - garam masala, chili powder, salt
